p: The human enteroviruses are divided in five species ( Table 40.1): human poliovirus with three serotypes; Coxsackievirus A including the serotypes 1–22, and also 24 are infectious to humans; the Coxsackievirus B of serotypes 1–6; echoviruses of serotypes 1–7, 9, 11–27, 29–33 and enteroviruses 68–71 ( Ehlers et al., 2005).
